name: El Chavo. A Carnival in the Apartments.
name_original: El Chavo. A Carnival in the Apartments.
description:
A CARNIVAL IN THE APARTMENTS

Have fun in the world's most famous apartments. Mr. Beliarge has organized a carnival and you'll be able to join Chavo and his friends playing great mini-games.

Show Mr. Raymond your mastery of Knockdown, visit Mr. Beliarge's shooting range, defeat Desperate Furious in his challenge and play with skulls and ghosts in Miss Pinster's Hauted House.

Earn tickets in the minigames and trade them for useful items on Mrs. Worthmore's shop.

Explore the apartments to see what surprises each inhabitant holds!

A Carnival in the Apartments is a game based on the wildly successful Chavo animated series, with innovative features and a faithful graphical style that will make you enjoy yourself at the world's most famous apartments.
publishers: Televisa Digital, Comercio Mas S.A de C.V
